mutants.code:
def rearrange_array(arr, n):
    result = []
    arr.sort()
    left = 1
    right = n - 1
    while left < right:
        result.append(arr[left])
        result.append(arr[right])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    if n % 2 == 1:
        result.append(arr[left])
    for i in range(n):
        arr[i] = result[i]
